content.body: was trying to get this figured out in our Tokyo planning channel but I guess the individuals who would know are not in there:
have hosts at other orgs needed to struggle to get an AV setup realized -- specifically, wrt to ensuring that local and remote audio are adequately integrated?

content.body: basically I had never thought about how a mic'ing setup designed for video conferencing (i.e. a series of fixed-position mics on the tables which all mute/unmute together) is fundamentally different from the individual mic'ing setup that our plenaries depend upon
